definitions.text: presently existing in fact and not merely potential or possible
examples: the predicted temperature and the actual temperature were markedly different

definitions.text: taking place in reality; not pretended or imitated
examples: we saw the actual wedding on television

definitions.text: being or reflecting the essential or genuine character of something; ; - G.K.Chesterton
examples: a literal solitude like a desert
the actual things that produced the emotion you experienced

definitions.text: being or existing at the present moment
examples: the ship's actual position is 22 miles due south of Key West
